text: aur moosa ne apanee qaum se hamaara vaayada poora karane ko (kohatoor par le jaane ke vaaste) sattar aadamiyon ko chuna phir jab unako zalazale ne aa pakada to hazarat moosa ne arz kiya paravaradigaar agar too chaahata to mujhako aur un sabako pahale hee halaaq kar daalata kya ham mein se chand bevakoophon kee karanee kee saza mein hamako halaaq karata hai ye to sirph teree aazamaish thee too jise chaahe use gumaraahee mein chhod de aur jisako chaahe hidaayat de too hee hamaara maalik hai too hee hamaare kusoor ko maaph kar aur ham par raham kar aur too to tamaam bakhshane vaalon se kaheeen behatar hai
